title: First Look: Specialized Bombards Us With Seven New Road and Gravel Tires
content:
Specialized's road and gravel tire lineup gets a massive overhaul, including a new race-only road tire, new road tires, and a vastly updated Pathfinder Pro.

Read the full article at First Look: Specialized Bombards Us With Seven New Road and Gravel Tires on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
